Episodes.Title: Coefficient of Drag
Episodes.Plot: Vic challenges Shane and deals with threats to his family; a federal agent arrives in Farmington to investigate a recent wave of violence.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, F.J. Rio, Anna Maria Horsford, Hector Luis Bustamante, Matt Corboy, Jos Viramontes, Necar Zadegan, Autumn Chiklis

Episodes.Title: Snitch
Episodes.Plot: As a local gang war heats up, Vic positions himself as a valuable commodity to the warring parties; Corrine and Cassidy confront Vic.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Scoot McNairy, Nigel Gibbs, F.J. Rio, Ludwig Manukian, Hector Luis Bustamante, Anna Maria Horsford, William Charlton, Mike Gomez, Autumn Chiklis

Episodes.Title: Money Shot
Episodes.Plot: Vic works an angle to make himself valuable to the Armenian mob; Corrine finds herself in a surprising legal jam; Tina targets a producer of adult entertainment.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Larry Clarke, Ludwig Manukian, Joseph D. Reitman, Alle Ghadban, Yorgo Constantine, Matt Corboy, Ryun Yu, Autumn Chiklis

Episodes.Title: Genocide
Episodes.Plot: The gang war erupts in unexpected ways that Vic cannot control; Dutch and Billings' homicide investigation grows into something more disturbing; Cassidy reaches out to Danny.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, F.J. Rio, Ludwig Manukian, Michael Bofshever, Kyle Gallner, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Autumn Chiklis, Frances Fisher

Episodes.Title: Game Face
Episodes.Plot: Claudette encounters a murderous old nemesis; Vic confronts Olivia about her political connections; Dutch's case gets personal.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Anna Maria Horsford, Bob Morrisey, Ray Campbell, Kyle Gallner, J.C. MacKenzie, Kimberly McCullough, Kareem Grimes, James Hiroyuki Liao, Tanner Richie, Frances Fisher

Episodes.Title: Animal Control
Episodes.Plot: Vic sets into motion plans to end the gang threat as his relationship with Cassidy deteriorates; Dutch and Billings investigate a possible sleepwalking murderer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Brian J. White, Scott Michael Campbell, Jose Pablo Cantillo, Sal Lopez, Ludwig Manukian, F.J. Rio, Chelse Swain

Episodes.Title: Bitches Brew
Episodes.Plot: A prostitute from Vic's past is the key to taking down a violent drug dealer; Dutch worries about Claudette's health; Danny takes drastic measures to protect her child.
Episodes.Writer: Charles H. Eglee, Elizabeth A. Hansen
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Patrick St. Esprit, Michele Hicks, F.J. Rio, Mageina Tovah, Billoah Greene, Paul Dillon, J.C. MacKenzie, Yasmine Abriel

Episodes.Title: Parricide
Episodes.Plot: A local priest may be protecting drug dealers; Dutch and Billings close in on attempted cop killers; Corrine learns uncomfortable truths about Vic.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, F.J. Rio, Billoah Greene, Silas Weir Mitchell, Paul Dillon, Brandon Fobbs, Yasmine Abriel

Episodes.Title: Moving Day
Episodes.Plot: Vic closes in on Shane, Mara and their sick young son; Claudette dismantles the Strike Team; Pezuela offers Acevada "assistance" for his mayoral campaign; Rita Denton (Frances Fisher) comes on to Dutch; and Billings' ex-wife and daughter are fearful when a registered sex offender moves into their neighborhood.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Nigel Gibbs, F.J. Rio, Paul Dillon, Francesco Quinn, Cooper Huckabee, Hannah Cox, Ping Wu, Natalie Dreyfuss, Ronnie Gene Blevins, Autumn Chiklis, Frances Fisher

Episodes.Title: Party Line
Episodes.Plot: While Shane remains holed up in L.A. with Mara and Jackson, Corinne decides to cooperate with Dutch and Claudette, who's now spearheading the LAPD effort to bring down Vic. Meanwhile, Vic plays Aceveda, Pezuela, Beltran and ICE against each other. But Ronnie's tempted to simply give up and run to Mexico. "And you should run too man" he tells Vic.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Nigel Gibbs, F.J. Rio, Francesco Quinn, DeLane Matthews, Autumn Chiklis

Episodes.Title: Petty Cash
Episodes.Plot: Corrine agrees to be Vic and Shane's go-between and also agrees to cooperate with Claudette and Dutch as she does so. Meanwhile, Vic comes to an understanding with Aceveda and seeks one out with Olivia; and Claudette assigns Ronnie to work with Julian to investigate the murder of a high-school football star, keeping Ronnie out of the barn and unable to intercept the letter Shane sent to Claudette detailing the Strike Team's "sins."
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Francesco Quinn, Virginia Watson, Peter Macon, Jemal T. McNeil, Stu

Episodes.Title: Possible Kill Screen
Episodes.Plot: Olivia joins forces with the Strike Team to catch a Mexican drug king and his shipment. Meanwhile, Dutch cleans up Billings' mess, and the death of a woman associated with the Strike Team prompts an investigation by Claudette.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Michele Hicks, Francesco Quinn, Paul Dillon, Jordan Marder, Frances Fisher

Episodes.Title: Family Meeting
Episodes.Plot: Officers in the Barn investigate a woman's disappearance and the arrival of a large drug shipment; lives change forever.
Episodes.GuestStars: Laurie Holden, Andre 3000, Michele Hicks, Julia Campbell, Kyle Gallner, Francesco Quinn, Peter Macon, Stu

Episodes.Title: Family Meeting, Part 2
Episodes.Plot: Officers in the Barn investigate a woman's disappearance and the arrival of a large drug shipment; lives change forever.
